name: Jump And Go
description:
This game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete and ends with a “thanks for playing” screen. Hang in there ‘til the end!

CONTROLS / TIPS

  • WASD keys or arrows to jump and run

TOOLS USED

  • Java
  • Bfxr
  • Paint.net

CREDITS

  • Texture Asset
  • All were done on YouTube streams -- first one.
